name: Fall off a mountain and die
name_original: Fall off a mountain and die
description:
This is Fall off a mountain and die. It's just a prototype, made for playing for 10 minutes when you're bored. If you like ragdolls, you might like this. You need a decent computer to run this. Made by a teen lol

In this game, you play as a human thats abnormally strong and cant walk nor stand up. The only option you have, is to do a leap of faith, and jump off the mountain. Easy, right?

Guide:

  • W,A,S,D to move, move the mouse to rotate camera (duh).
  • R to restart, and F to lock/unlock the mouse. (Restarting doesn't reset your settings)

Options:

  • In order to open the options, click the arrow thingy in the top left corner.
  • FOV changes your field of view. Default is 80, minmum is 40, max is 120.
  • Move speed changes your move speed up to 10x the normal speed.
  • Damage multiplier incrases the impact damage you take up to 10x.
  • Dismemberment toggles.... Dismemberment.
